targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id
FROM tplink
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

targets.query:
SELECT 
"sensors_0_relay" AS "Port 1", 
"sensors_1_relay" AS "Port 2", 
"sensors_2_relay" AS "Port 3"
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_3_relay" AS "Port 4", 
"sensors_4_relay" AS "Port 5", 
"sensors_5_relay" AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "emeter_get_realtime_power" AS "Relay" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND  "emeter_get_realtime_power" > 1

SELECT 
"sensors_0_voltage" AS "Port 1", 
"sensors_1_voltage" AS "Port 2", 
"sensors_2_voltage" AS "Port 3"
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_3_voltage" AS "Port 4", 
"sensors_4_voltage" AS "Port 5", 
"sensors_5_voltage" AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "emeter_get_realtime_voltage" AS  "Voltage" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_0_power" AS "Port 1", 
"sensors_1_power" AS "Port 2", 
"sensors_2_power" AS "Port 3"
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_3_power" AS "Port 4", 
"sensors_4_power" AS "Port 5", 
"sensors_5_power" AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "emeter_get_realtime_power" AS "Power" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_0_current" AS "Port 1", 
"sensors_1_current" AS "Port 2", 
"sensors_2_current" AS "Port 3"
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_3_current" AS "Port 4", 
"sensors_4_current" AS "Port 5", 
"sensors_5_current" AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "emeter_get_realtime_current" AS "Current" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT
mean("sensors_0_power") AS "Port 1", 
mean("sensors_1_power") AS "Port 2", 
mean("sensors_2_power") AS "Port 3" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 1h

SELECT
mean("sensors_3_power") AS "Port 4",
mean("sensors_4_power") AS "Port 5", 
mean("sensors_5_power") AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 1h
SELECT mean("emeter_get_realtime_power") as "Power" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 1h

SELECT
mean("sensors_0_power") AS "Port 1", 
mean("sensors_1_power") AS "Port 2", 
mean("sensors_2_power") AS "Port 3" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT
mean("sensors_3_power") AS "Port 4",
mean("sensors_4_power") AS "Port 5", 
mean("sensors_5_power") AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE time > now() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("emeter_get_realtime_power") as "Power" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT 
"sensors_0_powerfactor" AS "Port 1", 
"sensors_1_powerfactor" AS "Port 2", 
"sensors_2_powerfactor" AS "Port 3"
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT 
"sensors_3_powerfactor" AS "Port 4", 
"sensors_4_powerfactor" AS "Port 5", 
"sensors_5_powerfactor" AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT (emeter_get_realtime_power / (emeter_get_realtime_voltage * emeter_get_realtime_current) ) AS "PF" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT
mean("sensors_0_power") AS "Port 1", 
mean("sensors_1_power") AS "Port 2", 
mean("sensors_2_power") AS "Port 3" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 30d GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT
mean("sensors_3_power") AS "Port 4",
mean("sensors_4_power") AS "Port 5", 
mean("sensors_5_power") AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 30d GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("emeter_get_realtime_power") as "Power" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/  WHERE time > now() - 30d GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT
mean("sensors_0_power") AS "Port 1", 
mean("sensors_1_power") AS "Port 2", 
mean("sensors_2_power") AS "Port 3" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/   WHERE time > now() - 365d GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT
mean("sensors_3_power") AS "Port 4",
mean("sensors_4_power") AS "Port 5", 
mean("sensors_5_power") AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/   WHERE time > now() - 365d GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("emeter_get_realtime_power") as "Power" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/   WHERE time > now() - 365d GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT 
"sensors_0_power" AS "Port 1", 
"sensors_1_power" AS "Port 2", 
"sensors_2_power" AS "Port 3",
"sensors_3_power" AS "Port 4",
"sensors_4_power" AS "Port 5", 
"sensors_5_power" AS "Port 6" 
FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("emeter_get_realtime_power")  AS "Port" FROM /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("emeter_get_realtime_power") as "Power" FROM  /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)
SELECT (mean("emeter_get_realtime_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost" FROM  /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT mean("sensors_0_power") AS "Power.Port 1",mean("sensors_1_power") AS "Power.Port 2",mean("sensors_2_power") AS "Power.Port 3",mean("sensors_3_power") AS "Power.Port 4",mean("sensors_4_power") AS "Power.Port 5",mean("sensors_5_power") AS "Power.Port 6"  FROM  /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)

SELECT 
(mean("sensors_0_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost Port 1",
(mean("sensors_1_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost Port 2",
(mean("sensors_2_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost Port 3",
(mean("sensors_3_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost Port 4",
(mean("sensors_4_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost Port 5",
(mean("sensors_5_power") / 1000 * $cost ) as "Cost Port 6"
FROM  /^$SmartPlug$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) FILL(0)
